article.title: Northrop Grumman to Supply Land Navigation Systems for Republic of Korea's New Infantry Fighting Vehicle
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Northrop Grumman Corporation has been awarded a contract by Korean military systems and vehicle manufacturer Doosan DST Company Limited to deliver inertial navigation units for the Republic of Korea's new K21 infantry fighting vehicle. The LLN-G1 units will be built by the company's German navigation systems subsidiary, Northrop Grumman LITEF.
